ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.test

Class ClaimTagsTest

  • java.lang.Object
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.test.ClaimTagsTest

  • public class ClaimTagsTest
extends
    This test suite tests that a claim can have 0 or more tags, which can be removed, renamed, added, and listed correctly. User Stories tested: US03.01.01, US03.02.01, US03.03.01 General use case can be found on the wiki at https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/wiki/User-Stories-and-Requirements All tests should pass

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClaimTagsTest() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testaddTags()
      Part of Use Case C1 Tests that you're able to add a tag to a claim and that the tag MUST be alphanumeric Tests US03.01.01, US03.02.01 https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/issues/56 https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/issues/57
      void testNoDuplicates()
      Part of Use Case C1 Test that you cannot add duplicate tags Tests US03.01.01 https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/issues/56
      void testRemoveTags()
      Part of Use Case C1 Test that you can remove a tag https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/issues/56 Tests US03.01.01, US03.02.01 https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/issues/57
      void testRenameTags()
      Part of Use Case C1 Test Renaming a tag Tests US03.02.01 https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/issues/57
      void testTagManager()
      Test listing available tags as well as the TagManager Tests US03.02.01, US03.03.01 https://github.com/CMPUT301W15T13/TravelPlanner/issues/57
